name: Chasm (itch) (Outrun Arcade)
description:
Scale the Chasm. 

  1. Grab a power cell.
  2. Lob it into one of the colored intakes.
  3. The corresponding platforms will flip up.
  4. Use the flipped platforms to climb up.
  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump / Double Jump
  • F - Grab Power Cell
  • Left Mouse - Throw Power Cell.
